articles.author: Daanish Anand
articles.title: DGCA imposes hefty fines on Air Asia for violation of civil aviation regulations - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The imposition of fines and withdrawal of the head of training shows the DGCA's commitment to enforcing the regulations and maintaining the highest standards of safety in the aviation industry.

articles.title: Sisters scammed of $1250 on Carousell after wanting to buy iPhone for mum - AsiaOne

articles.title: Heiress Kim Lim had 'super traumatic' 8 months dealing with legal issues with ex-husband - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The 31-year-old daughter of billionaire Peter Lim was reportedly locked in a drawn-out legal battle with ex-husband Leslie Leow, and only signed the deed of separation papers on Tuesday (Feb 7).
articles.content: Singapore billionaire Peter Lims daughter Kim Lim took to Instagram on Wednesday (Feb 8) to announce that she is finally done with ex-husband, IT entrepreneur Leslie Leow, after a super traumatic eig… [+1656 chars]
